text: @DonaldJTrumpJr We can deliver quality covid19 testing kits in high quantities in an instant. 20 to 30 million kits ready for delivery just say the word! @realDonaldTrump @JustinTrudeau @IvankaTrump @Mike_Pence and additional medical supplies in high volume!
